sentences.sContent: This type of owl prefers a desert habitat.
sentences.sCn: 这种猫头鹰更喜欢沙漠的生活环境。

sentences.sContent: Employees said they would prefer more flexible working hours.
sentences.sCn: 员工们说他们希望有更具弹性的工作时间。

sentences.sContent: Or, if you prefer , you can email us.
sentences.sCn: 或者，你喜欢的话，可以给我们发电子邮件。

phrases.pCn: 宁可做某事；更喜欢做某事

words.tran: 更好的，更可取的；更合意的

trans.tranCn: 更喜欢；选择某事物（而不选择其他事物）
trans.tranOther: to like someone or something more than someone or something else, so that you would choose it if you could
